name: Inspection
description:
Inspection: is a Single Player Horror Game Designed and Produced by Shloppy Studios.


Step into the shoes of 135, a military inspector on his last legs. Follow Commander Garrison's orders and brave the ominous reaches of the DRT facility and attempt to uncover the secrets the corporation is desperately Trying to hide. Reconstruct the tales of the bunker's inhabitants and uncover the sequence of events that led to its dilapidated condition. Ensure that their lives and stories are not lost in vain, piecing together their narratives to shed light on the bunker's downfall.





Run, puzzle and crawl your way through the bunker. Make sure you do everything in your power to escape with its secrets and expose DRT and the evil they have been hiding for years. Beware, the robot residents of the facility do not take kindly to visitors. They will go to any lengths to tear apart, devour, and obliterate you, as well as anyone who dares to pursue or follow in your footsteps.
